𓆈 ⇔ 𓆊 I1 «multitude»

𓂝 𓈙 𓄿 𓆈 | many | asko @ basque (AF,EEF?)

1) #ꜥšꜣ Echse, exa 𓇋 𓆎 𓆈 ⋍ ἐχῖν archa 𓉻𓂝𓄿𓏜
2) Salamander 𓋴 𓆈 𓄿 𓏥 𓏠 Menge manche macha 𓉻𓂝𓄿𓏜 many mega much

𓋴 𓆈 𓄿 𓏽 "four legged creature" 𒃻𒌫𒇹 𒃻𒌫𒐽 šáurlimmu σαῦρος saûros “lizard, reptile”

𓆈 ⇔ 𓆊

The strong association between complement lizard and alligator carries over between Egyptian and Sumerian:

𒅗𒉺𒋗 ka-pa-šu copious > 𒆪𒋗 ku-šu copious, abundant 𓆈 !

𒆪𒋗 ku-šu ⇔ 𓆈 ꜥšꜣ Echse ἐχῖν
𒆪𒋗 ku-šu ⇔ 𓆊 champsai kaᵐpa-šu

еха exə exa 𓆈 ахəхəа ɑχəχəɑ exa 𓆈 extra : long

𓆈 ⇔ 𓆊 in
𓎛 𓆰 𓈖 𓏏 𓆊 | greed, need |
𓎛 𓆰 𓈖 𓏏 𓈙 | swampy lake, watercourse |
𓎛 𓆰 𓈖 𓏏 𓍔 𓄿 𓇓 𓅱 𓆈 | lizard | chemnty ⇔ champsai ⋍ ⲉⲙⲥⲁϩ

𒈲𒁕𒆸 dragóⁿ "gecko"

𓆎 𓅓 𓏜 ≈ 𒀝𒈬𒊏 agmura 𒅅𒈬𒊒 igmuru => 𓆎 ≈ ig(mur) :
𓆎 echse 𓆈

Salamander ⋍ 𓎛 𓆰 𓈖 𓏏 with 𓈖 ⋍ meander

𓆎 chomet = lizard 𓆈 Kermit caiman 𓆊 𓆌 𓆎 champsai ⋍ ⲉⲙⲥⲁϩ 𓆎 𓅓 𓊃 𓎛 𓆊 ⲉmzḥ

𓆊 𓆌 𓆋 𓆎 alligator el lagarto “the lizard” lacertus “lizard” influenced by unrelated alligator “one who binds”

𓆈 σαύρα sávra 𓋴 𓃀 𓎡 𓆌
𓆈 σαύρα saúra saurus 𒋢𒊏𒊒 su-ra-ru lizard 𒅴 𒋃 ṣurārû > سِحْلِيَّة siḥliyya
𓆈 saurut le'zaurut lézard lizard lacertus la'certa la'kərtənkələ cul
𓆎 𓆈 kərtənkələ ⇔ crocodile
𓆎 𓆈 кеҫәртке keθärtke
𓆎 𓆈 калта kalt̬a
𓆎 𓆈 șopîrlă 𓋴 𓃀 𓎡 𓆌 ⇔ șopîrcăi 𓋴 𓃀 𓍿 𓄑 𓀁 spass / goof ⇔ gecko
𓆎 𓆈 σήψ sḗps 𓋴 𓃀 𓎡 𓆌
𓆎 𓆈 sepinula 𓋴 𓃀 𓎡 𓆌
𓆎 𓆈 sisalik ⋍ 𒋎 ŠEMBULUGX 𓋴 𓃀 𓎡 𓆌 !
𓆎 𓆈 sisilisko @ Sicily

𓆈 πsaurus 𒉿𒉌𒇻𒊒 pi-zal-lu-ru gecko

𓆎 𓆈 ⇔ năpârcă nadder natter 𓆑 𓈖 𓍿 𓆙 adder

𓆈 | dove | ⋍ •salampati 🕊 sarampati! > columbus saeampati 𒋧𒈠𒌅 sum-ma-tu “dove” ⇔ 𒋎 ŠEMBULUGX

𓋴 𓆈 𓏥 | multiply | ∑ szoroz sokszorosít crēscere s'rise grow 𓋴 𓆈 𓏥 | multiply | շատացնել šatacʿnel 乘 chéng 增长 zeng zhang shumëzoj ضرب کردن zarb kardan çarp.mak 𓋴 𓆈 𓏥 | multiply | <> salamander 𓋴𓏠 | 𓏠𓋴 mnożyć się reverse

𒆰 NUMUN managfalton ≈ numunᵍ•pradu 𒆰𒌓𒁺 multiply 𓏠𓈖 #e₃ ≈ 𓆈 𓏥 𒆰 NUMUN managfalton ≈ numunᵍ•penti 𒆰𒄿𒄿 multiply 𓏠𓈖 #i'i ≈ 𓆈 𓏥
